collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (3 total Queries, 3 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `w`.`warehouse_name`, COUNT(i.id) as item_count, SUM(i.current_stock) as total_items, SUM(i.current_stock * i.unit_price) as total_value FROM `inventory_items` `i` JOIN `warehouses` `w` ON `w`.`id` = `i`.`warehouse_id` GROUP BY `w`.`id`, `w`.`warehouse_name`

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `w`.`warehouse_name`, COUNT(i.id) as item_count, SUM(i.current_stock) as total_items, SUM(i.current_stock * i.unit_price) as total_value FROM `inventory_items` `i` JOIN `warehouses` `w` ON `w`.`id` = `i`.`warehouse_id` GROUP BY `w`.`id`, `w`.`warehouse_name`
